name: Lettuce Inn
description:
Lettuce Inn is a short and fun visual novel about the daily life of an older gentleman who has been living in the middle of nowhere in a post-apocalyptic world with his greenhouse.

This game was made over the course of 7 weeks as part of a Uni course of the topic "Peace", where the goal was to make games without conflict and with a more casual and peaceful approach.

All Art Assets  were made by Beatrix Dehmel
Story and UI were made by Kristina Pelz
